name: Polar Panic (itch) (Johan Peitz)
description:
This winter a group of PICO-8 elves has worked hard to release a shiny new toy each day until the 25th of December. Check out the PICO-8 Advent Calendar 2019 every day for a new surprise! https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=36076

There's even more festive fun waiting on last year's calendar! https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=32388

Happy Holidays!
